text: "¿Qué Creias?" () is a song by American singer Selena. "¿Qué Creias?" became the third single from Entre A Mi Mundo (1992). It peaked at number 14 on the Hot Latin Tracks and number 16 on the Latin Regional Mexican Airplay chart. == Chart == Chart (1993) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 14 U.S. Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 16 == References == Category:Selena songs Category:1992 songs Category:Songs written by A.B. Quintanilla Category:Songs in Spanish
title: ¿Qué Creias?
